title: Topic 001 Question 046
body: You have an outage in your Compute Engine managed instance group: all instances keep restarting after 5 seconds. You have a health check configured, but autoscaling is disabled. Your colleague, who is a Linux expert, offered to look into the issue. You need to make sure that he can access the VMs. What should you do?
options: Grant your colleague the IAM role of project Viewer
Perform a rolling restart on the instance group
Disable the health check for the instance group. Add his SSH key to the project-wide SSH Keys
Disable autoscaling for the instance group. Add his SSH key to the project-wide SSH Keys
